column59: print information servicesvisitation thursday. june 18, 201511:00 am to 2:00 pmfull gospel tabernacle-richmond richmond, ky funeral service thursday. june 18, 20152:00 pmfull gospel tabernacle-richmond richmond, ky burial thursday. june 18, 2015. wallaceton cemetery-paint lick paint lick, ky geneva ogg powell, age 86, of maple grove road in richmond, passed away saturday, june 13, 2015 at berea health & rehabilitation center in berea. born friday, november 16, 1928 in the frog branch community of madison county, she was the daughter of the late james dow & mayme mae ballard ogg. she was the widow of the late tommy green powell. geneva was a factory worker and worked in food service and the bakery at berea college. she was a member of wallaceton baptist church since 1958. she loved to cook and will be remembered for having the best biscuits, fried chicken, and chocolate pie in town. geneva leaves behind four daughters, pamela gail abrams of richmond, mary ann coffey (lewis) and patricia lynn jude (brian) both of berea, and edith frances lunsford (leroy) of jackson county
column60: one son, tommy powell (darlene) of berea
column63: and several nieces and nephews. in addition to her husband and parents, she was preceded in death by three brothers, martin ogg, james ogg, and carl edward ogg
column64: three sisters, pearl calico, ruby payne, and eliza guinn
column65: and three grandchildren. a funeral service will be held 2:00pm thursday, june 18, 2015 at full gospel tabernacle, 762 kirksville road, richmond, ky 40475, with bro. rickey horn & bro. clyde coffey officiating the service. burial will follow in wallaceton cemetery in paint lick. cory abrams, josh richardson, aaron brock, tyler coffey, brian jude, and tommy powell will serve as active pallbearers. the visitation will be held 11am-2pm thursday at the church. the family would like to thank the compassionate care center in richmond and the berea health & rehabilitation center for the excellent care they gave geneva the past few years of her life. in lieu of flowers, memorial contributions suggested to the geneva ogg powell memorial fund, c/o fox & friend funeral home, 312 west main street, stanford, ky 40484. fox & friend funeral home, stanford, is entrusted with genevas arrangements. at www. friendfuneralhomes. com.
